element-type.name: subview
element-type.description: Provide ViewController support functionality for the nested content (typically a JSP dynamic include) of this component.

attribute-type.name: binding
attribute-type.description: Value binding expression used to bind this component instance to a backing bean property.

attribute-type.name: id
attribute-type.description: Component identifier of this component. If specified, this identifier must be unique within the context of the closest parent UIComponent that is a NamingContainer.

attribute-type.name: rendered
attribute-type.description: Flag indicating whether this component should be rendered. Default value is true.

element-type.name: token
element-type.description: Render a hidden input field whose value is the transaction token for the containing form.

attribute-type.name: binding
attribute-type.description: Value binding expression used to bind this component instance to a backing bean property.

attribute-type.name: id
attribute-type.description: Component identifier of this component. If specified, this identifier must be unique within the context of the closest parent UIComponent that is a NamingContainer.

attribute-type.name: rendered
attribute-type.description: Flag indicating whether this component should be rendered. Default value is true.

attribute-type.name: type
attribute-type.description: The type of validator associated with this tag

attribute-type.name: minlength
attribute-type.description: The minimum valid length of the field

attribute-type.name: maxlength
attribute-type.description: The maximum valid length of the field

attribute-type.name: mask
attribute-type.description: A regular expression to which the value must conform

attribute-type.name: datePatternStrict
attribute-type.description: A date pattern using syntax defined in java.text.SimpleDateFormat

attribute-type.name: message
attribute-type.description: A message displayed when validation fails

attribute-type.name: arg
attribute-type.description: A value that's plugged into the message

attribute-type.name: client
attribute-type.description: If true, validation is performed on the client

attribute-type.name: server
attribute-type.description: If true, validation is performed on the server

attribute-type.name: functionName
attribute-type.description: The name of the function to generate.
